name: twitterdialogbot
description: Twitter bot that posts written works line by line in order.
author: JP

scripts.zip: npm install --production && rm twitterdialogbot.zip && zip -r twitterdialogbot.zip . -x "**/*.gif" -x "**/*.jp*" -x "**/*.mov" -x "**/*.mp*" -x "**/*.png" -x "**/.DS_Store" -x "**/__*" -x "*.git*" -x "*.md" -x "*.zip" -x ".DS_Store" -x "__*" -x "check.js" -x "config/**/dev.js" -x "images*" && du -h twitterdialogbot.zip
